headline: Famine Strikes!
subline: Half of all farmer's lands lose fertility and are forced off their land

headline: War in Europe!
subline: Entire army is decimated! Country defenceless!

headline: War!
subline: Following an attack by the USA half of the army is left dead

headline: Explosion in the Iron Mines!
subline: An explosion in the iron mines leaves 20% of miners dead

headline: Cave In at the Stone Mines!
subline: An unexpected cave in at the Stone Mines leaves 30% of workers trapped forever
